definition: to make darker and difficult to perceive by sight
details:
verb
- to make darker and difficult to perceive by sight
= example: to make darker and difficult to perceive by sight
= synonyms: bedim
- to envelop with social, intellectual, or moral darkness
= example: to envelop with social, intellectual, or moral darkness
- to overtake with darkness or night
= example: to overtake with darkness or night
